O jogo é bom e caso tenha mais amigos pra jogar com você fica melhor ainda. Apesar de que as vezes certos players, na maioria iniciantes, tem um modo de jogo meio ruim de se lidar, mas no geral é divertido e eu aconselho muito.

Very good game fun to play very  needs to add a party system over all 69/70



BUY IT ITS GOOD

I highly recommend this game for anyone that is even remotely interested in it. It has very nice replay value, and the devs gave us free dlc that was quite fun. I'm not one for purchasing in-game cosmetic dlc, but since I enjoy this game so much, I chose to do so to show my appreciation to the devs for a job well done. Also, the free dlc was a nice touch to start the game season off.

Edit:
Still a great game. You will hate yourself for loving it so much. You will hurt yourself for constantly putting yourself through the torture of playing against ruthless killers that know your every move. Please buy this game and support my suffering.

10/10
Really fun with friends.

Nach einigen Bugs am Anfang läuft es jetzt nahezu Fehlerfrei und hat großes Potenzial in zukünftigen Updates mit neuen Karten, Überlebende und deren Builds, Killern mit bekannten Gesichtern und vielleicht neuen Spielmodi.
Einfach ein geniales Spielprinzip mit dazu stimmiger Atmosphäre

Обосанное комьюнити, излишнее количество кемперов, DEV's не пытются фиксить, придумывают новые DLC с новыми перками, которые вносят ещё больше дисбаналса в игру, а ну и шмотки, куда без них, ждём "опель" кейс. Кстати говоря, к 2022 добавили фризов, нормалды игра, всем советую. Ну если вам надоела спокойная радостная жизнь, если вам вдруг стало скучно

Advanced Hide and Seek where the losers are murdered in tragic ways, typically by being put onto a rusty old hook. If you dont die this way you might just bleed out, or be strangled, or stabbed, or bludgened, or even chainsawed in half.

After months of playing Dead by Daylight, no doubt in my mind that I enjoyed it. Very fun concept of a game but can get repetitive for some. This game has many exploits and bugs, but the devs constantly patch it in order to please the fans. With every patch comes a new bug or exploit. There isn't any dedicated servers the connection will be depended on the host which is the killer. Despite all of the exploits, bugs, and annoying fanbase; this game is straight up fun to play.

Cool game. I enjoy it quite a lot Especially with this new lvling system. Wish we had more clothing options
i think we did a pretty good job so far.

Simply amazing fun. New to the game and supporting the dev by buying all dlc's. Anyone crying about balance issues and only caring about leveling up miss the entire point of the experience in this game I feel.

When you are the killer, sure it's about killing the survivors and ranking up but is it entirely? I personally find joy in others joy and that means creating a real life experience of terror! If at the end of the game they are saying wow, that was terrifying then I feel it was a win even if I lost and didn't level up. The devs want you to give the survivors a thrilling experience! that's why it's setup the way it is for leveling the killer. 

If you are even on the fence about this game............JUST BUY NOW! NO REGRETS.

Ha valaki nem vérpistiként tolja, hanem csak néha néha pár órát folyamatosan meg marad az a kellemes para a játékban túlélőként.
Azért a másik ijesztgetése és szívatása sem rossz érzés a gyilkos oldalán.
Tényleg csak ajánlani tudom mindenkinek aki szereti ezt a "tini horror" stilust.
Не лезь, а то сожрет. Лучше не надо, я не шучу. Станете чаще нервничать из за помойного комьюнити этой игры.

jogo bom, recomendaria sim... mas não por esse preço!!!!
o jogo esta com o preço muito alto pelo que oferece.

aqui vai alguns contras:
- LAG demais, o jogo simplesmente não encontra e coloca voce em servers que o ping esteja mais baixo, simplesmente taca voce em qualquer fila com qualquer ping, e isso acaba favorecendo o caçador, pois voce buga e volta para o mesmo lugar.

-facadas via wirelles! o caçador as vezes esta tão lagado q as facadas eles dão distante e acerta voce!

-jogo MUITO MAS MUITO MAL OPTIMIZADO!  trava muito, mesmo tendo um pc master race esse jogo trava muito, não so o próprio jogo, como tambem todo seu computador... quando minimizado o meu pc começa a travar o chrome.

-michael mayers precisa de nerf, muito roubado! é praticamente um PAY 2 WIN, quem paga pela DLC pode ter o michael mayers que não da para ouvir ele chegando por tras!

-as perks são bem bostas, os devs precisam ter idéias melhores, pois algumas perks para sobreviventes servem para NADA, a não ser caçadores, tem perks para caçadores totalmente desbalanceadas.

-hacks.... SIM HACKS, de 20 partidas 5 eu peguei hack onde o caçados simplesmente sabiam estavam todos, bem bosta perde totalmente a graça do jogo.

-----------------------------------------------

tirando tudo isso, se voce tem 25 reais que é o preço que eu paguei na promoção, ate vale a pena mas bem no limite, na minha opinião por todos esses pontos negativos o jogo deveria custar 12 reais no maximo!

agora o jogo realmente é bom, tem potencial! é muito legal jogar com amigos principalmente e xingar o caçador que ele é cego :)

quando o jogo não buga é perfeito, mas a cada 10 partidas 6 bugam então pensem bem antes de comprar!
Good Game.

This game is pretty fun, and has a really cool premise.  However, there are multiple things that make it unoptimized.  For starters, if you're brand new you may still go up against either a Killer or Survivors that should be <10 in level.  The 'season refreshes' make this even worse a lot of the times. 
Once things are done to make sense - like changing unhook/disarm from the same button, this game could be great.  Until then it's fun to play in a group so you can all be frustrated together.

Надоело быть елочным украшением на крюке. Решил властвовать и унижать в роли маньяка. Пфф, Ага, эти четыре урода бегали и глумились  надо мной, да, да,да,  я хоть и не слышал, но точно чувствовал как они  истерично хахатали надо мной, бегали перед носом, закидывали поддонами, да я даже попал в собственный капкан твоюжмать, хотелось залесть в шкаф и  просто плакать. Блять, да кто здесь изверг и маньяк в конце то концов?? В итоге получил "Позорное поражение" 10 слезинок Траппера из 10.

Best game!

Swietna gra z dreszczykiem.Dla ludzi z przewrazliwieniem jej nie polecam.Na rozgrywke survivorem wystarczy poczekac okolo minute za to mordercom okolo 5 minut.Jedyne co mi sie niepodoba w tej grze ze wiekszosc mordercow ma ponad 30 lvl i od 8 do 1 rangi.Przez to wlasnie praktycznie na poczatku kazda rozrywka jest przegrywana.Przyklady jest taki ze na 5 rozgrywek tylko w jednejn udaje ci sie uciec i zdobyc ponad okolo 8 tys. punktow.Kazda postac ma jedna specjalna umiejetnosc.Jesli bedziemy levelowac tylko jedna postac to nie bedziemy mogli otrzrymac tej specjalnej umiejetnosci z innej postaci, lecz jesli kazda postac bedziemy levelowac po trochu to otrzymamy w tej postaci inna umiejetnosc ktora bez dostatecznego levela innej postaci by jej nie otzrymala.Do kazdej postaci sa umiejetnosci pokrywajace sie w innych postaciach.Umiejetnosci sa zwane perkami.Perki moga byc zielone,fioletowe i czerwone.Czerwone to najlepsze.Fioletowe posrednie.Zielone najslabsze.w grze natkniemy sie takze na szare perki ktore sa owiele slabsze od tych wczesniej wymienionych.Do gry czesto wychodza nowe rzeczy ,ale nawet przez to gra od wydanaia nie zrobila sie drozsza.Wszystkie punkt sa wkladane na wspolne konto wiec jesli dostaniemy punktu za gre mordercom to moze je zainwestowac w survivora.

        Dziekuje za przeczytanie.Przepraszam za bledy ortograficzne ,ale klawiatura jest chwilowo popsuta.Prosze o komentarze.

Enjoyable and fun to play when it works, unfortunaltey it's far too broken to get consistent gameplay.

Click 'Join a Lobby', get 'Failed to join the game', try joining a Lobby again only get to stuck with 'Waiting' or get stuck on a screen with the pulsating logo, either way I have to end-task the game and start again.

When the game does decide to let me join a Lobby it usually ends up with people joining and leaving and just hope you get to start with all 4 survivors, not that it makes much difference as most of the time someone has dropped by the end of the loading screen.

Dead By Daylight has so far been a point for so many arguments it's hard to count them. However, despite everything people might say it's still a super fun game to play. If you're a chill person that mostly play games for fun, you will enjoy it very much especially while you're being a low rank player, cause that's where all the nice people at. The more you grow rank-wise the more toxic people you meet on your way. Both killers and survivors abusing some game mechanics in their favor to make your lower point hurt with pain. But! That's not the game's fault, but the community's! 

Pros-
Good progression system.
An ok playerbase.
Fun with freinds.
Hard but rewarding.
Intense most of the game.

Cons-
Most people toxic
A lot of glitch abusers
A few bugs (anymore)
Killers and survivors abusing some game mechanics 
A lot of campers

All in all, get the game, play it (especially if some of your friends already do) and see for yourself! Chances are: you'd like it a lot! But as I said, beware of the toxic layer of community and avoid becoming one of them. After all it's just a game :)

Страдания! Тебе нравятся страдания?! Мне теперь да.
Игра все еще требует серьезной работы в плане багфиксов и синхронизацией между игроками. Но, довольно часто это добавляет особую изюминку. 
Бежишь за выжившим, а из-за плохого соединения он улетает вперед от тебя метров на 10? Страдай, это ДбД!
Хочешь снять с крюка своего друга, но сначала обезвредить ловушку под ним? Хрен тебе, фокус смажется на снятие с крюка и ты оказываешься пойман! Страдай, это ДбД!
Идеальный баланс глитчей и багов для обоих сторон! Может быть так и надо? И ведь как бы ни пошла игра, хочется еще и еще!
10 застреваний в генераторах из 10!

Dead by daylight is the worst game ever created. The braindead devs have no idea how to do anything on all fronts. Balancing is a joke, gameplay is perfect for bullies and assholes, and clearly playtesting doesn't exist. Every map, perk, and character was pulled from a rotten garbage bin, nothing actually works. You cannot win in any regard and if there's something remotely fun, it will be removed very soon. It's required to buy every meta perk or else you won't last 1 minute of game time, and good luck gridning through thousands of levels on each character just so you can stand your ground as any killer. Map design is a jagged mess of nonsense that benefits nobody. They build every single aspect of the game around pissing everyone off, you can't win without harassing the other players to oblivion. Good luck trying to escape it too, because you either take the bullying, or you get banned, you are forced to endure the BS. This game is not for anyone but the most decrepit people to walk the earth and bully everyone else to suicide. If you think you want this game, you don't, not even the devs do. Let his vile cash cow, decaying indie title burn in its own broken heap of dung. I've given this game every chance it had for years, gave it undeserved money for the half-assed chapters, and no update has ever fixed a god damned thing.

Have fun, playing literally anything but this.

Рецепт приготовления человеченки:
Берём трапера
Ставит в траву ловушки
Ловим сурва
Делаем ему хит, чтобы мясо было по нежнее
Хватаем его за плечо
Несём в подвал
Вешаем на крюк
Уходим чтобы не спугнуть другую дичь
Ждём когда он приготовится
Возвращаемся
Ловим другую дичь
Вешаем всю дичь на крюки
Ждём когда все истекут кровью
И наслаждаемся вкусным мяском

Great Game. Takes a new perspective on a classic game. So far their updates have been consistent and very helpful from bug fixes, to new edditions. With the addition to the new dlc bloodstained sack, i think they might be getting to overboard with dlc. WEll, payable atleast. I get its a business and companies need to make money but take COD for example. It used to be a pre order would get you all the dlc that would come out or it would be even free. Sooner or later people are going to get mad about havign to pay for everything. Please don't go down this path. I love this game very much, great atmosphere, great characters. I have no problems so far besides the possible dlc. But I think it is definitely worth the money and is definitely worth to play with friends. I hope this review helped anyone deciding on the game even possible feedback for the devs.
